code: import"./FileItem.scss";import word from"../../assets/images/word.png";import txt from"../../assets/images/txt.png";import pdf from"../../assets/images/pdf.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function FileItem(_ref){let{fileName,deleteFile}=_ref;function getFileExtension(){const parts=fileName.split('.');return parts.length>1?parts.pop():'';}const getIcon=()=>{const extension=getFileExtension();if(extension=="pdf")return pdf;if(extension=="docx")return word;return txt;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"file_item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"file_img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:getIcon(),alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"file_name",children:fileName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:deleteFile,className:"delete_file",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"btn_close",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-x"})})})]});}
